features: 👍【BEST FOR BIG AND TALL】 - The big and tall office chair with soft PU leather upholstery and unique appearance, and extra thickly cushioned desk chair for you maximum comfort. Executive chair have commercial-grade components, supports up to 400lbs.

👍【EASY TO SET UP】 - Big tall desk chair comes with all hardware & necessary tools. Follow the executive chair instruction, you'll found easy to set up, and big and tall office chair estimated assembly time in about 15-20mins.

👍【USB MASSAGE LUMBAR SUPPORT】 - Big tall office chair have excellent breathable PU leather design, soft and comfortable. Massage office chair have a vibrator with button, slight vibration can reduce the fatigue caused by your long hours of work.

👍【EXTRA WIDE SEAT FOR HEAVY PEOPLE】 - Big and tall office chair have heavy-duty metal base with 360-degree swivel and nylon smooth-rolling casters, great stability and mobility. And adjustable office chair offer is that you can personally adjust the chairs height of the chair to match your needs.

👍【Warranty】 - We guarantee you will love this big and tall chair which is cheap but good material. but if you’re not satisfied with this office chair, please get in touch with us, best service for you!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: We recommend this new big and tall office chair, unlike regular office chairs, it’s features bigger and wider seats/back for extra comfort on those long working days. An easy opportunity to eliminate any back pain that you may experience due to sedentary sitting. This office chair was designed with your comfort in mind. It will help improve your posture. Feature ✔Big and tall office chair have beautiful generous and strong practicability. ✔Office chair made using high-density sponge cushion with spring, more flexible. ✔Office chair with freely lumbar support, armrest, headrest protecting your spinal and neck. ✔Size and look makes the executive chair ideal for any bigger user. ✔360 degree with 100000 rolling swivel wheels and chair can be more flexible in working station. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was shocked at the quality. The price point is unbeleivable. Was not to difficult to asseble. Had to get my son to hold the chair still while I installed the back. They provide all the tools and I was pleasantly surprised that there is a pouch on the bottom so that you can run the massage feature from a mobile power pack. This works well. The chair rolls well and is very comfortable. I am 6'4" and about 350 pounds and I am very comfortable. I still cannot beleive this was less than $100. Everyone should by this chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome massage office chair
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as an office chair not realizing it was a masage chair too! Love, love, love this chair.... So comfortable, with on/off switch for massage. It's wonderful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars One thing not so good, but the rest makes up for it.
reviews.reviewText: Got it, found that the price did NOT include shipping, but thats okay. Putting it together was easy, but I thought it was a little low at its highest setting. THEN, I plugged it up and I love the vibrations. Very comfy. Good chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have had this chair for 3 years . The back is starting to wear out and the piston is starting to need to be reset to the highest position frequently. It now rocks a bit and has a slight tilt to one side. But 3 YEARS of use , before these problems have shown up. This is well built well worth the money. I’ve had 300 dollar gaming chairs go bad after a year . This chair has been impressive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is an all around amazing chair. The charger cord was missing from the box though. I contacted the seller and they were swift about sending me one free of charge was just a bit of a wait for it and I couldn't pay for expedited shipping for the cord but that isn't important. I am a big guy, with my old chair I had to use a chair cushion and was all tight and made noises when I sat and turned. This one complete 100% better. I can plop sit on this chair. Lean all the way back without feeling I'd fall. Perfect arm wrests, and seat size and cushion. I'm so very grateful for a chair like this in my line of work. Also I am very happy with support making sure I got this cord for the vibration of the chair which feels amazing. Also the installation was not bad at all whatsoever. Was actually easier putting this together than it was a smaller one. I hope this helps you make a choice. I'd choose this seller. Thank you very much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars No Product Support
reviews.reviewText: Got the package assembelled all the chair Finally the part where U connect the line to the socket to turn the massager on, I figured out that the line is the damaged and not working. I contacted the support and they told me that they will respond in 24 hours. This is the 7th day that I never got a response from them. However once you assemble the chair it’s too hard to turn it back to original and return so ONCE YOU BUY THIS POOR PRODUCT YOU’RE STUCK WITH IT AND IT’S A WASTE OF MONEY.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Don't buy for massage.
reviews.reviewText: The massage feature does not work. Buyer beware. But, it's comfortable.
